channel.title: Ancient-Fury
channel.description:
Ancient Fury is an server like no other. This server is bringing back the older days in the RuneScape history. This server is going to be one of the memorable servers out there. Such as BattleScape. Features: There is an great Combat System PvP PvN there is clipped Npcs and Clipped following. Magic is 100% Accurate to RuneScape all spells does everything RuneScape does. Example: Confuse does - Reduces your opponents attack by 5% That what happens on the server as-long as RuneScape. This server is an Pking Based server instead of an Econmic server but there will be ways to earn items Such as Barrows Etc.. Bosses: There will be KBD, Kqueen, Daggonth caves, Chaos elemental. That drop valuable items. Minigames: There will be no Mini-Games due to the fact mini-games arent really for an Private server. Skills: There will be all Combat skills trainable, WoodCutting, Herb, Fletching, Firemaking, Prayer Bone burying. High-Alchemy Low-Alchemy Tele-Grabben for drop partys etc. This will be an project i will code until i save up enough money to go to college. NOTE: I will never ever release this server to Rune-Server or any other forums out there. If i ever quitted this i would save it to an Disk and store it somewere. Will i accept partners to help join this project?: No Due to the fact that you can't really trust anyone that you do not know in person. So i am going to SOLO this project and get help by VIA Help threads instead of giving someone my codes. Release date: Hopefully by the end of October or Mid October or November. Stability: This server can hold as much as an Delta server but this is not an Dodian Base. And it's much more stabler as well. Thanks for taking your time to read this project. And Pictures will come along soon NOTE: any flame will be reported. Videos 100% Magic http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MUj6hFzcbvQ Npc Defense System/ Magic Video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Spl75MUcYZ0[/spoil] [b]UPDATES[/b] 9/30/09 Finished Edgeville Dungeon Spawn Finished Edgeville Dungeon Drops. Finished Edgeville Dungeon Max Hits/Defense Bonus and max hit. Finished Chaos druids using magic spells on players. Finished Clipped npcs in Edgeville Dungeon. Hoping to get done today: Finish shops. Finish Lumbridge Auto Spawn/Drops Finish Falador Auto Spawn/Drops Finish Cammy Auto Spawn/Drops. Finish Prayer Draining.
Quoted to make it look smaller and unique and im T.i. from rune-server aswell

item.title: Ancient-Fury
item.dc:creator: @Pvp_508 Pvp 508
item.description:
@Pvp_508 wrote:

Ancient Fury is an server like no other. This server is bringing back the older days in the RuneScape history. This server is going to be one of the memorable servers out there. Such as BattleScape.

Features:
There is an great Combat System PvP PvN there is clipped Npcs and Clipped following. Magic is 100% Accurate to RuneScape all spells does everything RuneScape does.

Example:

Confuse does - Reduces your opponents attack by 5%

That what happens on the server as-long as RuneScape.

This server is an Pking Based server instead of an Econmic server but there will be ways to earn items Such as Barrows Etc…

Bosses:

There will be KBD, Kqueen, Daggonth caves, Chaos elemental. That drop valuable items.

Minigames:

There will be no Mini-Games due to the fact mini-games arent really for an Private server.

Skills:

There will be all Combat skills trainable, WoodCutting, Herb, Fletching, Firemaking, Prayer Bone burying.

High-Alchemy
Low-Alchemy
Tele-Grabben for drop partys etc.

This will be an project i will code until i save up enough money to go to college.

NOTE: I will never ever release this server to Rune-Server or any other forums out there. If i ever quitted this i would save it to an Disk and store it somewere.

Will i accept partners to help join this project?:

No Due to the fact that you can’t really trust anyone that you do not know in person.

So i am going to SOLO this project and get help by VIA Help threads instead of giving someone my codes.

Release date:
Hopefully by the end of October or Mid October or November.

Stability:

This server can hold as much as an Delta server but this is not an Dodian Base.

And it’s much more stabler as well.

Thanks for taking your time to read this project.

And Pictures will come along soon

NOTE: any flame will be reported.

Videos

100% Magic
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MUj6hFzcbvQ

Npc Defense System/ Magic Video
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Spl75MUcYZ0[/spoil]

UPDATES
9/30/09
Finished Edgeville Dungeon Spawn
Finished Edgeville Dungeon Drops.
Finished Edgeville Dungeon Max Hits/Defense Bonus and max hit.
Finished Chaos druids using magic spells on players.
Finished Clipped npcs in Edgeville Dungeon.

Hoping to get done today:
Finish shops.
Finish Lumbridge Auto Spawn/Drops
Finish Falador Auto Spawn/Drops
Finish Cammy Auto Spawn/Drops.
Finish Prayer Draining.

Quoted to make it look smaller and unique and im T.i. from rune-server aswell
